line_1: The Mother, wi' her needle and her sheers,
line_2: And each for other's weelfare kindly spiers:

line_1: The Mother, wi' her needle and her sheers,
line_2: Each tells the uncos that he sees or hears.

line_1: The Mother, wi' her needle and her sheers,
line_2: The Parents partial eye their hopeful years;

line_1: For monie a year come thro' the sheers:
line_2: So may they, like their great forbears,

line_1: No! we must part; e'en now fate lifts the sheers,
line_2: To cut the thread of my scarce half-spun years.
